message.content: This question tests knowledge about inheritance and genetics. Offspring receive genes from their parents, which determine their characteristics. Option (D), moles, is the correct answer because moles are a physical trait that can be passed down from parent to offspring through genes. Options (A), (B), and (C) are unrelated to genetics and offspring receiving genes.
